title: Wall Street Breakfast, April 10th: President Xi Eases Investors' Worries
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Today’s top stories: China President Xi Jinping eases tariff tensions; the U.S. budget deficit is set to soar past $1 trillion dollars; and all social media eyes are on Mark Zuckerberg as he testifies before Congress. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
